entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
